function.description:
Finds a single document using the specified `query` and `options` and deletes it. Also returns the document that was deleted. If multiple documents match the query, the first document in the result will be deleted. If no documents match the `query` it will return `null`.
The `options` parameter may contain the following options:
| Option | Description | | ------------ | ----------- | | `projection` | A document describing the fields to return for the matching document. | | `sort` | A document with sort criteria to apply to the query. The default is `null`, which means that the documents will be returned in an undefined order. | | `maxTime` | The maximum execution time in milliseconds for this operation. |
